casebody.data:
Steven GRODENSKY, Plaintiff
v.
Roger MCLENDON, MD, Duke University Health System, Inc. d/b/a Duke University Medical Center, Associated Health Services, Inc., Duke Medicine Global Support Corporation, The Duke University School of Medicine Research Foundation, and Private Diagnostic Clinic, Defendants No. COA17-1258-2 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 3, 2018

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED. REMANDED IN PART.
